name: Consultar Parametros
func:
var sensor_name = msg.payload.sensor
var query = `select min_value, max_value from params where sensor = '${sensor_name}' and state = 'A'`
msg.params = msg.payload
msg.topic = query

return msg;

name: tabla ph
tabla humedad
tabla tempo agua
tabla temp aire
tabla params
func:
msg.topic = `create table params(
    sensor text not null,
    min_value decimal not null default 0,
    max_value decimal not null DEFAULT 0,
    created_at integer(4) not null default (strftime('%s','now')),
    updated_at integer(4) not null default (strftime('%s','now')),
    created_by text not null default "Admin",
    state text not null default "A"
);`
return msg;

name: datos de params
func:
msg.payload = `insert into params (sensor, min_value, max_value) values ("Humedad",55,65);insert into params (sensor, min_value, max_value) values ("Ph",5.5,6.5);insert into params (sensor, min_value, max_value) values ("Temp_aire",17,22);insert into params (sensor, min_value, max_value) values ("Temp_agua",18,26);`
return msg;

name: Query select all
func:
var sensor = msg.req.params.sensor
var fecha = msg.req.params.date

switch (sensor) {
    case "humedad":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_humedad where created_at >= ${fecha}`        
        break;
    case "ph":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_ph where created_at >= ${fecha}`
        break;
    case "temp_agua":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_temp_agua where created_at >= ${fecha}`
        break;
    case "temp_aire":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_temp_aire where created_at >= ${fecha}`
        break;
    default:
        msg.response = "404"
        msg.fail = `Bad Resquet. Sensor ${sensor} database not found`
        
}

return msg;

name: EndPoint Historico mayores a una fecha
info:
# La estructura del endpoint
Devuelve la lista de todos los datos con fecha mayor a la fecha ingresada  en la ruta

http://[server_host]:1880/data/historico/:sensor/date/:date

## Sensor names

- humedad
- ph
- temp_agua
- temp_aire

name: Traformar data de respuesta
Insert new params
Update old params
Query select all
func:
var min_fecha = msg.req.params.min_date
var max_fecha = msg.req.params.max_date
var sensor = msg.req.params.sensor

switch (sensor) {
    case "humedad":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_humedad where created_at >= ${min_fecha} and created_at <= ${max_fecha};`        
        break;
    case "ph":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_ph where created_at >= ${min_fecha} and created_at <= ${max_fecha}`
        break;
    case "temp_agua":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_temp_agua where created_at >= ${min_fecha} and created_at <= ${max_fecha}`
        break;
    case "temp_aire":
        msg.response = "200"
        msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM sensor_temp_aire where created_at >= ${min_fecha} and created_at <= ${max_fecha}`
        break;
    default:
        msg.response = "404"
        msg.fail = `Bad Resquet. Sensor ${sensor} database not found`
        
}

return msg;
